title: GE.com profile font?
content:
Anyone know which fonts GE.com are using in their profile?  
In the menu and over the photo on their index-page?

Thanks in advance.

 [‹ "Miami Beach Florida" geometric Art Deco display sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121112602/http:/typophile.com/node/44105 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Restoring Endangered Trees, similar to ITC Golden - Adobe Jenson {James Block} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121112602/http:/typophile.com/node/44150 "Go to next forum topic")
author: 1UP
